It is just an 8-minute walk from the centre of Zell am See and the ski lifts, with a free ski shuttle offered in winter. The Seehotel’s light-flooded design rooms offer satellite TV, a minibar, a seating area, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Most feature a flat-screen TV. 2 saunas, a steam bath, a Kneipp pool, and an infrared cabin are available in the spa area. Guests can enjoy a wide range of massage and beauty treatments. The fitness room offers direct lake views. The restaurant features a winter garden overlooking the lake, as well as a lakeside terrace. It serves international and Austrian cuisine made from regional products. Half-board includes a breakfast buffet and a 4-course dinner with a choice of dishes and a salad bar. Surrounded by a 3,000 m² garden, Seehotel Freiberg features a private beach on the lake. Free private parking is available on site. In summer, the Zell am See-Kaprun Card is included in the price. This card comprises free benefits and discounts in the entire region.At Hotel Heitzmann, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.Enjoy the mountains and the lake at first hand when staying in the Hotel Seevilla Freiberg Zell am See, and experience the perfect mix of pleasure, activity, and relaxation holidaying in the province of Salzburg. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.Enjoy international cuisine at Cafe Imperial, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Boutique Hotel Goldenes Lamm offers free WiFi access and a limited number of free parking spaces. A free shuttle service to ski resort Gerlitzen is also available. Café Restaurant Goldenes Lamm serves Austrian and international cuisine. You can also dine in the air-conditioned winter garden or, during summer months, in the outdoor area in the main square. The rich breakfast buffet is served daily in the new air-conditioned breakfast room on the first floor. It includes organic dishes and products suitable for diabetics. Guests receive discounts on ski passes and ski rental as well as discounts for the KärntenTherme spa. It offers free wired internet access in the rooms and free WiFi in all areas. Consisting of 3 carefully renovated, historic buildings, Heritage Hotel Hallstatt features a bar and a sunny lakeside terrace. There is also a café with a winter garden right next to Hallstatt's boat landing. The hotel’s restaurant Im Kainz offers traditional Austrian dishes and fine wines. All rooms and suites at Heritage Hotel offer views of the town and Lake Hallstatt. The rooms are all individually furnished and feature cable TV, a minibar, and tea and coffee-making facilities. Haus Kainz is the main building, with the breakfast room, the café and the bar, as well as a sauna, an infrared cabin and a lift. Haus Stocker is Hallstatt's oldest (more than 400 years) building and truly unique. Haus Stocker is a 3-minute walk away from the main building. Haus Seethaler enjoys a hillside location and offers panoramic lake views. It is a 5-minute walk away from the main building. Haus Stocker and Haus Seethaler have no lift. All guests of the Heritage Hotel get bathrobes, slippers and toiletries free of charge. Parking is possible for a charge in the P1 parking area outside the town. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.Located in Anderlecht, within 900 metres from Gare du Midi and a 17-minute walk from Grand Place and Manneken Pis, Slina Hotel Brussels offers an on-site restaurant and a bar. Guests benefit from free WiFi access and bicycle rental services. Rooms at the Slina come with a safety deposit box, a TV and a desk. They also include a private bathroom with a shower, a toilet and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served on site, and guests can also enjoy traditional dishes in the hotel’s restaurant/snack bar. From the accommodation, it is 1.6 km to Sablon, 1.7 km to Brussels Central Station and 1.8 km to Square Meeting Centre. Brussels Airport is 17 km away from Slina Hotel Brussels. Metro stop 'Clemenceau' is located 200 metres from the accommodation and offers a direct connection to the city centre in 10 minutes. Alternatively there is also a bus stop which will also bring you to the city centre in about 10 minutes.Located in Anderlecht, within 900 metres from Gare du Midi and a 17-minute walk from Grand Place and Manneken Pis, Slina Hotel Brussels offers an on-site restaurant and a bar. From the accommodation, it is 1.6 km to Sablon, 1.7 km to Brussels Central Station and 1.8 km to Square Meeting Centre. Brussels Airport is 17 km away from Slina Hotel Brussels. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary bottled water.The Leopold Hotel Brussels EU is family owned for 35 years and is run by Richard & Christine along with an experienced team of happy and cheerful staffWith 1 restaurant and an all-weather garden terrace, Hotel Leopold offers a fine setting for a stay in Brussels. The European Parliament can be reached within less than a 3-minute walk. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a work desk and seating area. Breakfast is available in the breakfast room, which is decorated with plants and has an opening glass roof. It consists of a large hot and cold buffet with fresh Italian coffee, as well as a selection of teas. Guests can enjoy a pasta buffet and Belgian meals in the Leopold brasserie. For gourmet dining, the L'Ange Corner offers an international menu. Drinks are served in the English-style Tavern Bar. The Hotel Leopold Brussels is located a 5-minute walk from the Trone Metro Station. You can reach the European Commission and the Magritte Museum in a 12-minute walk. The Airport Express Bus stops 150 metres from the hotel.Welcome to a family owned and managed hotel. We took over the Made in Louise hotel in October 2011, after 8 months of full renovation, we have re-open our doors with a brand new cosy and charming hotel.Just 300 metres from Avenue Louise, Made in Louise offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. Its lobby has a 24-hour front desk, a complementary tea and coffee corner, and an elevator. This 3-star hotel is located a 5-minute walk from the Louise Metro Station, which offers direct access to Gare du Midi in 3 stops. The European Parliament is a 15-minute walk away. Rooms at Made in Louise hotel have a spacious bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. All have a rain shower and some have a bathtub. Some rooms offer courtyard views. A freshly prepared buffet-style breakfast is served daily. The snack bar serves light snacks and a variety of drinks. Several restaurants are also located along Avenue Louise.Welcome to a family owned and managed hotel. While retaining part of their features, the hotel's guests enjoy contemporary surroundings and modern comforts, as well as personable service from a dedicated team of staff! Being located within the old city center, just outside of the hustle and bustle, it's just a few minutes' stroll to the central squares. As well as a private parking facility, there is an indoor pool and popular lounge bar with terrace.Guests staying at the centrally yet tranquilly located Flanders Hotel enjoy free WiFi, a heated indoor pool and an extensive breakfast buffet. The property is set in the centre of Bruges, just 650 metres from Market Square. All rooms at Flanders Hotel include satellite TV with international programming and in-room hot drinks facilities. The en-suite bathroom features free toiletries. Each morning, breakfast is served in the dining room overlooking a terrace with a pond. The buffet includes freshly baked bread, scrambled eggs, bacon and fresh fruit. Guests can also enjoy locally brewed beers or cocktails in the on-site bar. Many restaurants are located in the vicinity of the accommodation. The Concert Hall is just over a 15-minute walk from Hotel Flanders and the Groeninge Museum is a 10-minute walk away. Bruges Railway Station is 2 km from the hotel.Flanders Hotel occupies the premises of a former 'Grand Hotel' and monastery, dating back to 1235 AD. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.Did you know that Sofia is one of the fewest cities in the world that has operational Orthodox church, Muslim mosque and Jewish synagogue placed in a close triangle within 2 minutes walk by foot from each other? Religious tolerance and peaceful coexistence is something of a tradition in Bulgaria, and a very high-minded to say at least. Did you know that the hotel is located exact in that cross of religious tolerance? If not, just book our hotel and you will only walking distance of all historical, cultural and religional places. And not only this but you will be accommodated in magnificent building displaying fabulous old style architecture from the end of the XIX century, recorded in Ministry of culture as cultural monumental building.Located on the pedestrian shopping street Pirotska, a 5-minute walk from the centre of Sofia and 350 metres away from Serdika Subway Station, Sveta Sofia Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. A fitness centre is available for free, while the sauna, the solarium and the massages are available at a surcharge. Guests are provided with one-time free access to Victoria SPA thermal zone and indoor pool. Each room is equipped with a TV with cable channels, and a minibar. Some units come with a seating area with a sofa. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower or a bath, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Sveta Sofia Hotel houses a restaurant. Special diet menus and grocery delivery are organised upon request. A wide range of restaurants, bars, cafeterias and grocery shops can be reached in a 5 to а 10-minute walk. Sofia Market Hall and the famous Women's Market can be reached in 300 to 500 metres. Sofia Airport is set 9.3 km away. Shuttle services are offered by the Sveta Sofia Hotel upon request and at a surcharge.Stop by the hotel's restaurant, Stara Sofia Restaurant, for lunch or dinner. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Hotel Allegro are of distinctive design and décor, and many offer panoramic views of Bern and the distant Alps. The Gourmet Restaurant Meridiano is situated on the 6th floor and specializes in authentic European cuisine made from the finest natural ingredients. The Chef is Fabian Raffeiner, whose culinary creations have earned 16 Gault Millau Points. The Meridiano also features a Michelin star. At the Restaurant Yù you will get over 30 Asian gourment specialities at the popular Asian Dream Buffet, while the Restaurant Giardino offers fine Italian cuisine. The Allegro bar offers fine drinks and, in summer, a stylish lounge area with views of the pond. A smoker's lounge is also available. Guests have free access to the fitness centre with cardio machines. Massages can be organised on request and for a surcharge. At a surcharge, guests can rent bicycles. Underground parking is available for a surcharge. The Bern-Wankdorf motorway exit is 2 km away, and the main train station is 5 minutes away on tram line 9, stopping directly in front of the hotel. Guests benefit from free public transport in Bern. This smoke-free hotel was built in 1900. It retains the charm of a small family owned hotel built in the 1930's, but with 21st century conveniences.The Hotel Meda is located 2 metro stops from Charles Bridge and the Old Town. All the most important sights can be reached easily. It houses a restaurant offering views of the town and a summer outdoor terrace overlooking the river and the park. The historic 16th-century building of the Hotel Gold features elegantly furnished en-suite rooms, fitted with a TV, a minibar and a telephone. The hotel can arrange many activities for the guests, including boat rides on the river, horseback riding, golf as well as tickets for various cultural and social events. The spa at the Alemannenhof Hotel-Appartements includes a sauna. Guests can also access the wellness area of the neighbouring property, and book massages there. Alemannenhof Hotel-Appartements has a jetty and provides a free boat transfer to the town of Titisee. Golf, horse riding, and skiing are possible nearby.Enjoy international cuisine at Pentalounge, a restaurant which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and blackout drapes/curtains.Situated on the A8 motorway between Stuttgart and Munich, just 9 km north of Ulm, this family-run hotel offers an indoor pool and inviting rooms with free WiFi. The property also offers a conference room and the possibility to host various events on site. The Seligweiler Hotel & Restaurant invites you to start your day with a large breakfast buffet, which is included in the room rate. During warm weather, enjoy your breakfast on the terrace. Enjoy Swabian and international dishes in the cosy Grenzstube. The border between Baden-Württemberg and Bavaria runs right through the restaurant. You can also enjoy steaks and pasta dishes in the charming JakobsGrill, or enjoy a drink in the hotel bar. After a long day, guests can enjoy in the hotel spa area with a sauna, steam bath and an indoor pool. Situated beside a motorway service station, the Hotel Seligweiler is an ideal stopover for travellers. It is also convenient for exploring the Swabian Alb, or for bike rides along the River Danube. See the sights of Ulm or enjoy a day trip to Legoland in Günzburg (a 20-minute drive away).Satisfy your appetite with regional cuisine at Wintergarten, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace. It’s all about boutique individuality. Our charming hotels, each featuring individual and design-conscious decor, are located at the best addresses in Copenhagen. At Arp-Hansen Hotel Group, we cultivate the unique character of each individual hotel, its surroundings, and its historical background – all of which are reflected in the design. Arp-Hansen Hotel Group offers accommodation to suit every taste and travel budget, whether you are seeking the luxury of a heritage royal lodge, dreaming of the canal side romance of Nyhavn Canal with its old wooden schooners, or crave the amenities of an ultramodern hotel with panoramic skyline views.Dating back to the 17th century, this luxury hotel is 3 minutes’ walk from Amalienborg Palace and the charming Nyhavn waterfront. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.In this authentic Haussmannian mansion, you will be taken back in time when contemplating the portraits of its original owner, Emilie and Alexander Bradford.You can enjoy a relaxing moment at the hotels bar the “Lady B”, which is situated under a superb glass roof. Its décor has been created by the interior designer Sophie Hanniet, who brought a mix of feminine elegance, and the refinement you would find in the 50s. To reach one of the 50 rooms of the hotel, you may take its magnificent original antique elevator with glass windows and metal caging. These unique rooms offering quality features enhance the ‘chic Parisian’ feel of the whole property.The 4-star Bradford Elysées is set in a Haussmannian building, near the famous Champs Elysées in central Paris. It offers refined guest rooms and a breakfast room with a glass roof. Each of the spacious guest rooms at Bradford Elysées has a classically elegant décor, and is equipped with an iPod docking station and cable TV. Some rooms feature a balcony and each room includes complimentary non-alcoholic beverages in the minibar. The tiled private bathrooms include a marble sink. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s luminous dining room. Guests can also choose to have breakfast served in the guest room. Starting in the afternoon until late in the evening, guests can also enjoy free non-alcoholic beverages and snacks in the hotel lobby. Guests can stop by any of Astotel's hotels in Paris to enjoy this service and have a drink or snack, free of charge. The Bradford Elysées hotel is a 5-minute walk from Franklin D. Roosevelt Metro Station providing direct access to the Tuileries Gardens, the Louvre Museum and Place de la Bastille. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the hotel, and all rooms are serviced by a lift. After a day of sightseeing, guests can relax in the hotel lounge.Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 11:00 AM and on weekends from 7:00 AM to noon for a fee. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.Just steps from the Champs-Elysées, on the Georges V Avenue, Four Seasons Hotel George V features private terraces with commanding Paris city views, signature lavish flower displays imagined by Jeff Leatham, top-of-the-line spa treatments and Michelin-awarded dining. The palatial rooms and suites, many with private terraces overlooking the city of Paris, are fitted with an interactive TV, CD/DVD player and library and WiFi access. Espresso coffee machine with complimentary coffee pods, safe, mini bar, and in-room bread toasting service are standard. Four Seasons Hotel George V, Paris provides three restaurants recognised by the coveted Michelin Award for a total of 5 stars. Classic French cuisine and lighter menus have earned Le Cinq restaurant three Michelin stars. The chic La Galerie is a favourite spot among fashionable Parisians for a drink or light bite. Le George offers light Mediterranean cuisine designed for sharing. The 7-metre high conservatory offers views of the marble courtyard and houses the Orangerie Restaurant, where guests will be able to enjoy French Traditional cuisine with a contemporary touch. Both Le George and L'Orangerie has 1-Michelin star. Le Bar proposes cocktails and light meals and its large windows open on to the famous Avenue George V. The spa, spread over 720 square metres, includes a 17-metres swimming pool, vitality pool with hydro-massage water experience circuit heated to 34°C, a 90 m² cutting-edge fitness room, and a stylish hair salon. Moreover, other facilities include valet and concierge service, as well as meeting and banquet facilities with dedicated staff. Just 1.6 km from Eiffel Tower and 3.5 km from Musée d'Orsay, Four Seasons Hotel George V Paris enjoys an ideal location in the Golden Triangle, famous for high-fashion boutiques. It is also 3.5 km from the trendy shops and cafes of St. Germain-des-Prés. The hotel offers parking at an extra cost.Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge.
